text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
translation.id.indonesian: dan (Kami membinasakan) kaum Nuh sebelum itu. Sesungguhnya mereka adalah kaum yang fasik.
